mapper.insert: insert into Member ( m_id, m_pw, m_name, m_birth, m_email, m_phone, m_addr1, m_addr2, m_addr3, approval_key, approval_status ) values( #{m_id}, #{m_pw}, #{m_name}, #{m_birth}, #{m_email}, #{m_phone}, #{m_addr1}, #{m_addr2}, #{m_addr3}, #{approval_key}, #{approval_status} )
mapper.select: select count(*) from member where m_id = #{m_id}
select count(*) from member where m_email = #{m_email}
mapper.update: update member set approval_status = ' true' where m_email = #{m_email} and approval_key =#{approval_key}
update member set m_lastact = SYSDATE where m_id = #{m_id}
mapper.select: select m_id from member where m_email = #{m_email} and m_name = #{m_name}
mapper.insert: insert into BusinessMember ( m_id, bm_cate, bm_name, bm_addr, bm_url, bm_account, bm_intro, bm_phone ) values( #{m_id}, #{bm_cate}, #{bm_name}, #{bm_addr}, #{bm_url}, #{bm_account}, #{bm_intro}, #{bm_phone} )
